item.title: Installing copy on Ubuntu 14.04
item.description:
One service, that I like using to keep my data in sync with multiple computers is Copy; a servcie that provides 15GB of storage

Here are my notes on how to install it.

item.title: Installing maven 3.3.3 on Ubuntu
item.description: Maven is software project management tool usually used for for JVM based projects. One of its features is dealing with external project dependencies similar to pip from python.
